pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, February 23, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Toronto, Ontario

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Labourersâ€™ International Union of North America (LiUNA) Local 183 Stewards Seminar, and will deliver remarks. Minister of Employment, Workforce Development and Labour Patty Hajdu will be in attendance.

LiUNA Local 183
Gerry Gallagher Hall
1263 Wilson Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for remarks
    • Media are asked to arrive to the registration desk in the lobby outside of the Gerry Gallagher Hall no later than 7:15 a.m.

8:20 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Employment, Workforce Development and Labour Patty Hajdu will meet with members of the LiUNA leadership.

Closed to media.
